xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/303324-DIshes: A Documentary About Collecting Fiesta 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Fiesta is the name for the Homer Laughlin China Company's line of brightly-colored plates, bowls, mugs, and other dishware. Used in millions of homes, Fiesta is one of the most popular items for sale on eBay and at antique malls. But why is it so popular? The documentary DISHES seeks answers to these questions, ultimately looking answer to the bigger question, "Why do people collect things?" DIshes: A Documentary About Collecting Fiesta
